mapper.select: SELECT project_sq FROM TBL_SCRAP_S WHERE user_sq = #{userSq} AND scrap_type_cd = 601

SELECT project_sq, project_ttl, project_recruit_start_dt, project_recruit_end_dt, project_candidate_cnt, project_created_at_dtm, project_required_education_cd, project_developer_grade_cd FROM TBL_PROJECT_M WHERE project_sq = #{projectSq}
SELECT c.company_sq, c.company_nm FROM TBL_PROJECT_M p JOIN TBL_COMPANY_S c ON p.company_sq = c.company_sq WHERE p.project_sq = #{projectSq}

SELECT p_area.area_sigungu AS parentSigungu, area.area_sigungu AS sigungu FROM TBL_PROJECT_M p JOIN TBL_ADDRESS_S a ON p.address_sq = a.address_sq JOIN TBL_AREA_C area ON a.area_code_sq = area.area_code_sq LEFT JOIN TBL_AREA_C p_area ON area.parent_area_code_sq = p_area.area_code_sq WHERE p.project_sq = #{projectSq}
